import React from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; import Logo from '../img/MEME.gif' function Meme({ meme, userInfo, setCurrentPage }) { const userId = userInfo.id function archiveMeme(event) { event.preventDefault(); const url = 'http://localhost:8000/store' const method = 'post' const body = { users_id: userId, meme_url: meme } const data = { users_id: userId, meme_url: meme } axios({ url, method, body, data }) .then(setCurrentPage('profile')) .catch(err => console.log('error: ', err)) } return (
